attributes.action: refuse free healthcare for people unwell due to a lifestyle choice that is advised against (drinking, smoking, drugs, bad diet etc.)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should the NHS spend so much money on people who are unhealthy due to doing things they are told not to.  People who drink alcohol, smoke or eat unhealthily should be aware of the risks and be prepared to face the consequences.  Many people have to wait for an operation because of the amount of operations needed for others.
